archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0650
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable customer and account data to be sourced from internal systems (e.g. Billing, CRM) and 3rd parties (e.g. DCA, Credit Bureau

properties.value: Please deliver full list of 3rd parties Only DCA,Credit Bureau Credit Bureau: Every month file with customer payments has to be send (with assigned score for each payment, 0-5). 0 - payment on time, 1+ payment delayed VFNZ AP: Can you please deliver samples of file for both 3rd parties integration + exact mapping for payment score like: 0 - payment on time, 1 - delayed

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
